document.full_text: two more somalis pleaded guilty in u.s. court tuesday for pirating a yacht that led to the murder of two american couples and face mandatory sentences of life in prison.
document.title: two more somali pirates plead guilty in u.s. court
lines_and_colors: two more somalis pleaded guilty in u.s. court tuesday for pirating a yacht that led to the murder of two american couples and face mandatory sentences of life in prison.
